Featured Article



[Notice of Intent to Purchase a Custom Built Lenovo Thinksystem Server](https://www.parsippany.net/News/View/3371/notice-of-intent-to-purchase-a-custom-built-lenovo-thinksystem-server)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Posted Friday, January 2, 2026

![](https://www.parsippany.net/_Content/img/news/public-notice.jpg)


**Notice of Intent to Award Contract under A National Cooperative Purchasing Agreement**

The Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills intends to participate in the Omnia national purchasing cooperative, contract for ‚ÄúAdvanced Technology Solutions Aggregator issued to Micro Strategies to purchase a Custom Built Lenovo Thinksystem Server.

Information regarding the contract may be found at the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills, Purchasing Department, 1001 Parsippany Boulevard, Parsippany, NJ during regular business hours as well as on the Omnia website at:¬† [**https://www.omniapartners.com/suppliers/td-synnex/public-sector/contract-documents#contract-1957**](https://www.omniapartners.com/suppliers/td-synnex/public-sector/contract-documents#contract-1957)

It is the intent of the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills to make a contract award to Micro Strategies pursuant to the proposal submitted in response to the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hill‚Äôs request.

The Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills is permitted to join national cooperative purchasing agreements under the authority of N.J.S.A. 52:34-6.2(b)(3).

Comment period ends:¬† 1/16/25

Suzanne Taylor, QPA  
Director of Purchasing

[View Official Notice Here](https://www.parsippany.net/_Content/pdf/notices/2026-01-16-Micro-Strategies-Custom-Built-Lenovo-Server.pdf)

Featured Article



[LEGAL NOTICE TOWNSHIP OF PARSIPPANY-TROY HILLS PUBLIC NOTICE REQUIREMENT](https://www.parsippany.net/News/View/3377/legal-notice-township-of-parsippany-troy-hills-public-notice-requirement)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Posted Tuesday, January 13, 2026

![](https://www.parsippany.net/_Content/img/news/official-notice-scroll.png)


NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN, in accordance with the requirements of P.L. 2025, c. 72, the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills provides the following public statement regarding the posting, publication, and accessibility of all municipal legal notices:  
  
All legal notices issued by the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills ‚Äì including notices of meetings, ordinances, public hearings, bids and procurement matters, and other items required by law - shall be published on the Township‚Äôs official website: [www.parsippany.net](http://www.parsippany.net), whereby the complete text of each legal notice may be obtained or viewed and will be available to the public free of charge.  
  
Pursuant to P.L. 2025, c. 72, the validity of any Township legal notice shall not be impaired due to clerical, administrative, or technical errors; website outages; cyber incidents; or other disruptions that are beyond the Township‚Äôs control.  
  
This notice is issued by the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills to satisfy the compliance requirements of P.L. 2025, c. 72, and shall be posted on the Township‚Äôs official website.  
  
Khaled Madin  
Township Clerk

[View Notice Here](https://www.parsippany.net/_Content/pdf/notices/Public-Notice-Jan-2026-Publishing-Legal-Ad.pdf)

Featured Article



[Notice of Rescheduled Council Meeting](https://www.parsippany.net/News/View/3376/notice-of-rescheduled-council-meeting)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Posted Monday, January 12, 2026

![](https://www.parsippany.net/_Content/img/news/official-notice-scroll.png)


Please be advised, the Township Council of the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills must reschedule its Regular Council meeting that was scheduled for January 20, 2026.¬† The rescheduled date is Tuesday, January 27, 2026 in the Municipal Building located at 1001 Parsippany Boulevard, Parsippany. Khaled Madin

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![](https://www.parsippany.net/_Content/img/news/MorrisCo-Flood-Maps-Jan2026.JPG)


Transparency in local government starts with keeping residents informed. Mayor Pulkit Desai is pleased to share that FEMA will be hosting two open house sessions for Morris County residents this January. With new flood maps being released, it‚Äôs vital for property owners in Parsippany-Troy Hills to understand how these changes impact their insurance and property requirements. These sessions offer a direct line to FEMA representatives for one-on-one guidance. Protecting our township's future starts with being prepared today.

Featured Article



[Notice of Planning Board Special Meeting](https://www.parsippany.net/News/View/3370/notice-of-planning-board-special-meeting)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Posted Monday, December 22, 2025

![](https://www.parsippany.net/_Content/img/news/official-notice-scroll.png)


PLEASE TAKE NOTICE that in accordance with the Open Public Meetings Act (N.J.S.A. 10:4-6 et seq.), the Planning Board of the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills will hold a Special Meeting on:

* Date: Wednesday, December 24, 2025
* Time: 10:30 a.m.
* Location: Municipal Building, 1001 Parsippany Boulevard, Parsippany, NJ 07054

THE PURPOSE OF THIS MEETING is for the Planning Board to conduct a Courtesy Review pursuant to N.J.S.A. 40:55D-31 regarding the subdivision of property located at 1050 Littleton Road, Parsippany, New Jersey 07054, Block 166, Lot 96, which is to be purchased by the Township.  
  
The Board may also discuss any other business that may properly come before it. Formal action may be taken.  
  
The public is invited to attend this meeting. This notice has been:  
1. Posted on the official bulletin board in the Municipal Building;  
2. Filed with the Township Clerk;  
3. Transmitted to the Township's official newspapers (The Daily Record and The Star-Ledger).  
  
Nora O. Jolie Planning Board Tech. Asst.

[View Official Notice Here](https://www.parsippany.net/_Content/pdf/notices/2025-12-24-PB-Special-Meeting-Notice.pdf)

[Notice of Intent to Award Contract to Catepillar Inc. to Purchase a Catepillar Inc Model 938 Wheel Loader with Foley Inc.](https://www.parsippany.net/News/View/3368/notice-of-intent-to-award-contract-to-catepillar-inc-to-purchase-a-catepillar-inc-model-938-wheel-loader-with-foley-inc)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Posted Tuesday, December 9, 2025

![](https://www.parsippany.net/_Content/img/news/public-notice.jpg)


**Notice of Intent to Award Contract under A National Cooperative Purchasing Agreement**

The Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills intends to participate in the Sourcewell national purchasing cooperative, contract for ‚ÄúHeavy Construction Equipment‚Äù ‚Äì Contract# 011723-CAT issued to Catepillar Inc. to purchase a Catepillar Inc Model 938 Wheel Loader with Foley Inc..

Information regarding the contract may be found at the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills, Purchasing Department, 1001 Parsippany Boulevard, Parsippany, NJ during regular business hours as well as on the Sourcewell website at:¬† [**https://sourcewell.website/explore-contracts/?contract\_ids=2126#category\_all**](https://sourcewell.website/explore-contracts/?contract_ids=2126#category_all)

It is the intent of the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills to make a contract award to Foley Inc. pursuant to the proposal submitted in response to the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hill‚Äôs request.

The Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills is permitted to join national cooperative purchasing agreements under the authority of N.J.S.A. 52:34-6.2(b)(3).

Comment period ends:¬† December 22, 2025

Suzanne Taylor, QPA  
Director of Purchasing
